name: War Against The Mad King - Demo
name_original: War Against The Mad King - Demo
description:
I've been working on this game for the last few months for my 2D Videogame Development subject and it's finally done.

It's a 2D platformer in the style of the retro Castlevania games, these are the ones that were made before Symphony of the Night took a more Metroid style of gameplay.

Please remember to write some feedback after playing it, it will help me improve in my next projects

Controls:

A/D: Movement
O: Sword attack
P: Subweapon
Space: Jump
S+Space on a platform: Fall down
Backspace: Pause/Unpause

Break the blue orbs with your sword to obtain items like subweapons or health and energy potions. Spend that energy to attack with your subweapons.

I do not own any of the sounds and music used in this project and I don't make profit out of them.

Music used:
Menu: Sad Song by DigiZoo on freesound.org https://freesound.org/people/DigiZoo/sounds/273662/
